00050 //camera is servo 3
00051 
00052 unsigned const int cameraMiddle = 82;  //camera face front at 82 degree
00053 unsigned const int cameraRight = 0;   //camera face right at 0 degree
00054 unsigned const int cameraLeft = 168;  //camera face right at 0 degree
00055 
00056 //lifter is servo 1
00057 unsigned const int maxDegree = 0;   //lifter max height in degree
00058 unsigned const int minDegree = 150;   //lifter min height in degree
00059 unsigned int currentDegree = 150;
00060 
00061 
00062 //grabber is servo 2
00063 
00064 unsigned const int grabberOpen = 180;
00065 unsigned const int grabberClose = 122;
00066 
00067 
00068 //Configure PORTB 5 pin for servo motor 1 operation
00069 void servo1_pin_config (void)
00070 {
00071  DDRB  = DDRB | 0x20;  //making PORTB 5 pin output
00072  PORTB = PORTB | 0x20; //setting PORTB 5 pin to logic 1
00073 }
00074 
00075 //Configure PORTB 6 pin for servo motor 2 operation
00076 void servo2_pin_config (void)
00077 {
00078  DDRB  = DDRB | 0x40;  //making PORTB 6 pin output
00079  PORTB = PORTB | 0x40; //setting PORTB 6 pin to logic 1
00080 }
00081 
00082 //Configure PORTB 7 pin for servo motor 3 operation
00083 void servo3_pin_config (void)
00084 {
00085  DDRB  = DDRB | 0x80;  //making PORTB 7 pin output
00086  PORTB = PORTB | 0x80; //setting PORTB 7 pin to logic 1
00087 }
00088 
00089 //Initialize the ports
00090 void arm_port_init(void)
00091 {
00092  servo1_pin_config(); //Configure PORTB 5 pin for servo motor 1 operation
00093  servo2_pin_config(); //Configure PORTB 6 pin for servo motor 2 operation
00094  servo3_pin_config(); //Configure PORTB 7 pin for servo motor 3 operation
00095 }
00096 
00097 //TIMER1 initialization in 10 bit fast PWM mode
00098 //prescale:256
00099 // WGM: 7) PWM 10bit fast, TOP=0x03FF
00100 // actual value: 42.187Hz
00101 void timer1_init(void)
00102 {
00103  TCCR1B = 0x00; //stop
00104  TCNT1H = 0xFC; //Counter high value to which OCR1xH value is to be compared with
00105  TCNT1L = 0x01;        //Counter low value to which OCR1xH value is to be compared with
00106  OCR1AH = 0x03;        //Output compare eegister high value for servo 1
00107  OCR1AL = 0xFF;        //Output Compare Register low Value For servo 1
00108  OCR1BH = 0x03;        //Output compare eegister high value for servo 2
00109  OCR1BL = 0xFF;        //Output Compare Register low Value For servo 2
00110  OCR1CH = 0x03;        
00111  OCR1CL = 0xFF;        //Output Compare Register low Value For servo 3
00112  ICR1H  = 0x03;
00113  ICR1L  = 0xFF;
00114  TCCR1A = 0xAB; /*{COM1A1=1, COM1A0=0; COM1B1=1, COM1B0=0; COM1C1=1 COM1C0=0}
00115                                          For Overriding normal port functionalit to OCRnA outputs.
00116                                   {WGM11=1, WGM10=1} Along With WGM12 in TCCR1B for Selecting FAST PWM Mode*/
00117  TCCR1C = 0x00;
00118  TCCR1B = 0x0C; //WGM12=1; CS12=1, CS11=0, CS10=0 (Prescaler=256)
00119 }
00120 
00121 
00122 //Function to initialize all the peripherals
00123 void arm_init_devices(void)
00124 {
00125  cli(); //disable all interrupts
00126  arm_port_init();
00127  timer1_init();
00128  sei(); //re-enable interrupts
00129 }
00130 
00131 
00132 //Function to rotate Servo 1 by a specified angle in the multiples of 2.25 degrees
00133 void servo_1(unsigned char degrees)
00134 {
00135  float PositionPanServo = 0;
00136  PositionPanServo = ((float)degrees / 2.25) + 21.0;
00137  OCR1AH = 0x00;
00138  OCR1AL = (unsigned char) PositionPanServo;
00139 }
00140 
00141 
00142 //Function to rotate Servo 2 by a specified angle in the multiples of 2.25 degrees
00143 void servo_2(unsigned char degrees)
00144 {
00145  float PositionTiltServo = 0;
00146  PositionTiltServo = ((float)degrees / 2.25) + 21.0;
00147  OCR1BH = 0x00;
00148  OCR1BL = (unsigned char) PositionTiltServo;
00149 }
00150 
00151 //Function to rotate Servo 3 by a specified angle in the multiples of 2.25 degrees
00152 void servo_3(unsigned char degrees)
00153 {
00154  float PositionTiltServo = 0;
00155  PositionTiltServo = ((float)degrees / 2.25) + 21.0;
00156  OCR1CH = 0x00;
00157  OCR1CL = (unsigned char) PositionTiltServo;
00158 }
00159 
00160 //servo_free functions unlocks the servo motors from the any angle
00161 //and make them free by giving 100% duty cycle at the PWM. This function can be used to
00162 //reduce the power consumption of the motor if it is holding load against the gravity.
00163 
00164 void servo_1_free (void) //makes servo 1 free rotating
00165 {
00166  OCR1AH = 0x03;
00167  OCR1AL = 0xFF; //Servo 1 off
00168 }
00169 
00170 void servo_2_free (void) //makes servo 2 free rotating
00171 {
00172  OCR1BH = 0x03;
00173  OCR1BL = 0xFF; //Servo 2 off
00174 }
00175 
00176 void servo_3_free (void) //makes servo 3 free rotating
00177 {
00178  OCR1CH = 0x03;
00179  OCR1CL = 0xFF; //Servo 3 off
00180 }
00181 
00183 void CameraMiddle()
00184 {
00185  servo_3(cameraMiddle);
00186  _delay_ms(50);
00187 }
00188 
00190 void CameraRight()
00191 {
00192  servo_3(cameraRight);
00193  _delay_ms(50);
00194 
00195 }
00196 
00198 void CameraLeft()
00199 {
00200  servo_3(cameraLeft);
00201  _delay_ms(50);
00202 
00203 }
00204 
00207 void Lift(float Height)
00208 {
00209  //CONVERT Degree TO DEGREE
00210  float tempD = minDegree - maxDegree;
00211 
00212 
00213  float temp2 = (Height * 10 * tempD )/ 1010;   //this number needs to be optimized
00214  
00215  int Degree = minDegree - (int) temp2;
00216  
00217  int i = 0;
00218  for (i = currentDegree; i > Degree; i--)
00219  {
00220    servo_1(i);
00221    _delay_ms(20);
00222  }
00223  currentDegree = Degree;
00224 }
00225 
00226 
00228 void Lower()
00229 {
00230  int i = 0;
00231 
00232   for (i = currentDegree; i <minDegree; i++) //change max to current degree
00233   {
00234    servo_1(i);
00235    _delay_ms(20);
00236   }
00237 }
00238 
00240 void Grab()
00241 {
00242  int i=0;
00243  for (i = grabberOpen; i > grabberClose; i--)
00244   {
00245     servo_2(i);
00246     _delay_ms(20);
00247   } 
00248 }
00249 
00251 void Release()
00252 {
00253  int i=0;
00254  for (i = grabberClose; i < grabberOpen; i++)
00255  {
00256   servo_2(i);
00257   _delay_ms(20);
00258  }
00259 }
